subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: By the time Felix Hernandez allowed his first hit Friday, the Mariners had already pounded 10 off A.J. Burnett, who dropped to 9-11 on the season with the loss.
snippet: By the time Felix Hernandez allowed his first hit Friday, the Mariners had already pounded 10 off A.J. Burnett, who dropped to 9-11 on the season with the loss.
